caption.p: ATP dependency of contraction and fragmentation. ATP was kept at a constant level during the experiment by enzymatic regeneration (see ‘Material and methods’). Buffer containing ATP concentrations listed in the table and 0.3 µM myofilaments were added to medium and or low-density MACs. Contraction here is defined as visible dynamic rearrangements of actin filaments after myofilament addition. Fragmentation implies visible actin filament breakage events after myofilament addition
